verses.verse: Then he brought <S%H7725><s%> me back <S%H7725><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the outward <S%H2435><s%> sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> which looks <S%H6437><s%> toward the east; <S%H6921><s%> and it was shut. <S%H5462><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to me; This <S%H2088><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> shall be shut, <S%H5462><s%> it shall not be opened, <S%H6605><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> in by it; because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> has entered <S%H935><s%> in by it, therefore it shall be shut. <S%H5462><s%>

It is for the prince; <S%H5387><s%> the prince, <S%H5387><s%> he shall sit <S%H3427><s%> in it to eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> he shall enter <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of that gate, <S%H8179><s%> and shall go <S%H3318><s%> out by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the same.

Then brought <S%H935><s%> he me the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the house: <S%H1004><s%> and I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and I fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face. <S%H6440><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> mark <S%H7760><s%> well, and behold <S%H7200><s%> with your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> with your ears <S%H241><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I say <S%H1696><s%> to you concerning all <S%H3605><s%> the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the laws <S%H8451><s%> thereof; and mark <S%H7760><s%> well the entering <S%H3996><s%> in of the house, <S%H1004><s%> with every <S%H3605><s%> going <S%H4161><s%> forth <S%H4161><s%> of the sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>

And you shall say <S%H559><s%> to the rebellious, <S%H4805><s%> even to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> O you house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> let it suffice <S%H7227><s%> you of all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations, <S%H8441><s%>

In that you have brought <S%H935><s%> into my sanctuary strangers, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in heart, <S%H3820><s%> and uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in flesh, <S%H1320><s%> to be in my sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> to pollute <S%H2490><s%> it, even <S%H853><s%> my house, <S%H1004><s%> when you offer <S%H7126><s%> my bread, <S%H3899><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> and the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and they have broken <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> because <S%H413><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

And you have not kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of my holy <S%H6944><s%> things: but you have set <S%H7760><s%> keepers <S%H8104><s%> of my charge <S%H4931><s%> in my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> for yourselves.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> No <S%H3808><s%> stranger, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in heart, <S%H3820><s%> nor uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in flesh, <S%H1320><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> my sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> stranger <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> that is among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that are gone away far <S%H7350><s%> from me, when Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H8582><s%> astray, <S%H8582><s%> which <S%H834><s%> went <S%H8582><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> away from me after <S%H310><s%> their idols; <S%H1544><s%> they shall even bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

Yet they shall be ministers <S%H8334><s%> in my sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> having charge <S%H6486><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and ministering <S%H8334><s%> to the house: <S%H1004><s%> they shall slay <S%H7819><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering and the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> for the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them to minister <S%H8334><s%> to them.

Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> they ministered <S%H8334><s%> to them before <S%H6440><s%> their idols, <S%H1544><s%> and caused the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to fall <S%H4383><s%> into iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> and they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

And they shall not come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to me, to do the office of a priest <S%H3547><s%> to me, nor to come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to any <S%H3605><s%> of my holy <S%H6944><s%> things, in the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place: but they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame, <S%H3639><s%> and their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have committed. <S%H6213><s%>

But I will make them keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> thereof, and for all <S%H3605><s%> that shall be done <S%H6213><s%> therein.

But the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> that kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H8582><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> from me, they shall come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to me to minister <S%H8334><s%> to me, and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me to offer <S%H7126><s%> to me the fat <S%H2459><s%> and the blood, <S%H1818><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%>

They shall enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> my sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> and they shall come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to my table, <S%H7979><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> to me, and they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my charge. <S%H4931><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that when they enter <S%H935><s%> in at <S%H413><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> they shall be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen <S%H6593><s%> garments; <S%H899><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> wool <S%H6785><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> on them, whiles they minister <S%H8334><s%> in the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> and within. <S%H1004><s%>

They shall have <S%H1961><s%> linen <S%H6593><s%> bonnets <S%H6287><s%> on their heads, <S%H7218><s%> and shall have <S%H1961><s%> linen <S%H6593><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> on their loins; <S%H4975><s%> they shall not gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with any thing that causes sweat. <S%H3154><s%>

And when they go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the utter <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> even into <S%H413><s%> the utter <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> they shall put <S%H6584><s%> off their garments <S%H899><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they ministered, <S%H8334><s%> and lay <S%H3240><s%> them in the holy <S%H6944><s%> chambers, <S%H3957><s%> and they shall put <S%H3847><s%> on other <S%H312><s%> garments; <S%H899><s%> and they shall not sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with their garments. <S%H899><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they shave <S%H1548><s%> their heads, <S%H7218><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> suffer their locks <S%H6545><s%> to grow <S%H7971><s%> long; they shall only <S%H3697><s%> poll <S%H3697><s%> their heads. <S%H7218><s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall any <S%H3605><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> when they enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court. <S%H2691><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they take <S%H3947><s%> for their wives <S%H802><s%> a widow, <S%H490><s%> nor her that is put <S%H1644><s%> away: but they shall take <S%H3947><s%> maidens <S%H1330><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or a widow <S%H490><s%> that had <S%H1961><s%> a priest <S%H3548><s%> before.

And they shall teach <S%H3384><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> the difference between <S%H996><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> and profane, <S%H2455><s%> and cause them to discern <S%H3045><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean. <S%H2889><s%>

And in controversy <S%H7379><s%> they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in judgment; <S%H8199><s%> and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> it according to my judgments: <S%H4941><s%> and they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my laws <S%H8451><s%> and my statutes <S%H2708><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> my assemblies; <S%H4150><s%> and they shall hallow <S%H6942><s%> my sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%>

And they shall come <S%H935><s%> at <S%H413><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> person <S%H120><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves: but for father, <S%H1><s%> or for mother, <S%H517><s%> or for son, <S%H1121><s%> or for daughter, <S%H1323><s%> for brother, <S%H251><s%> or for sister <S%H269><s%> that has had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> husband, <S%H376><s%> they may defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves.
And after <S%H310><s%> he is cleansed, <S%H2893><s%> they shall reckon <S%H5608><s%> to him seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he goes <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> to the inner <S%H6442><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> his sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

And it shall be to them for an inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> I am their inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> them no <S%H3808><s%> possession <S%H272><s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%> I am their possession. <S%H272><s%>

They shall eat <S%H398><s%> the meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and the trespass <S%H817><s%> offering: and every <S%H3605><s%> dedicated <S%H2764><s%> thing in Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be theirs. <S%H1992><s%>

And the first <S%H7225><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> things, and every <S%H3605><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%> of all, <S%H3605><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> sort of your oblations, <S%H8641><s%> shall be the priest's: <S%H3548><s%> you shall also give <S%H5414><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> the first <S%H7225><s%> of your dough, <S%H6182><s%> that he may cause the blessing <S%H1293><s%> to rest <S%H5117><s%> in your house. <S%H1004><s%>

The priests <S%H3548><s%> shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> thing that is dead <S%H5038><s%> of itself, or torn, <S%H2966><s%> whether <S%H4480><s%> it be fowl <S%H5775><s%> or beast. <S%H929><s%>
